list.title: Select correct output of this code
list.description:
let v1 = 10
let v2 = 3

const sumSqrt = (val1, val2) => {
   const sqrt1 = val1 * val1
   const sqrt2 = val2 * val2
   return sqrt1 + sqrt2
}

const result = (sumSqrt(v1, v2) * 10) % 3
